name: VernadosBoukrisTalk
commands: Vernados.{w} You're just in time.|Melaina is giving us the rundown on what happened at the border.
Oh, is everything ok?|You guys didn't run into the Delnatian army, did you?
We did.{w} We were there when they crossed the border.|They ran us right over like we were nothing.|Their general killed Palmero herself.|I was the only one to make it out alive.
Goddess...{w} Palmero's dead, then?|If they could kill him, how the hell was my crew able to escape?
Hold on.|Did you just say your crew was attacked by the Delnatian army?
Well, I don't think it was their main army.{w} Just some scouts.|But yeah, we ran into them on the way back from Recoletos.
So they've made it the far already...|Vernados, I have another job for you.
Already?{w} Shouldn't we be laying low with all the soldiers roaming around?
The kid's right on this one, boss.|One wrong step and we could have an entire army on us.
This isn't a wrong step.|It's time to make a bold strike, now that the army is occupied.|The two countries should be too busy fighting each other to notice us.
That is true...|They only got us because we were in the way of their march.

There's a royal armory a little to the north of here, at the end of the foothills.|If my judgement is correct, it should be loosely guarded.|Vernados, I want you to raid the armory for as much gold and weapons you can get.|I'll send Ralph to support you, too.
Hold on, you're sending me with the kid?!|You know my crew isn't the best at head on fighting.
With Melaina's crew wiped out, it's my only choice.|I think you should be able to handle yourself fine.
This sounds like a tough job, boss...|But my crew won't let you down.|I'll go get started on preparations.
Are you sure this is the right move, boss?|I'm not sure if raiding a royal armory is the safest thing...
Of course it isn't safe, Ralph.|To get the biggest reward, you have to take the biggest risk.|Surely you've learned that in all your years here.
I won't argue with you, boss.|Guess I should go rile up my crew, wherever the hell they are.
